text: Douglas Wright may refer to: * Douglas E. Wright (born 1955), Canadian horror writer * Douglas Wright (murderer) (1940–1996), first criminal executed by lethal injection in Oregon * Douglas Wright (dancer) (1956–2018), New Zealand dancer and choreographer * Douglas Tyndall Wright (born 1927), Canadian civil engineer * Douglas S. Wright, former attorney, mayor of Topeka, Kansas and candidate for the United States Congress ==See also== *Doug Wright (disambiguation)
title: Douglas Wright
